for i in range(num_columns):
    row = []
    for j in range(num_columns):
        num = 0
        denom1 = 0
        denom2 = 0
        corr = 0
        for k in range(num_rows):
            xi = numeric_data[k][i] - means[i]
            xj = numeric_data[k][j] - means[j]
            num = num + xi * xj
            denom1 = denom1 + xi * xi
            denom2 = denom2 + xj * xj
        if denom1 == 0 or denom2 == 0:
            corr = 0
        else:
            corr = num / (denom1 ** 0.5 * denom2 ** 0.5)
        row.append(corr)
    matrix.append(row)
